title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if indicates domain of integrand

1 point is earned if chooses component of domain of integrand containing 1 and finds all x such that 2x is in that component.

t  2   + t ≥ 0 ; (  t ≥ 0   )  or  (  t ≤ − 1  ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4ECB@

Since 1≥0,want 2x≥0 Therefore x≥0
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned if indicates domain of integrand

1 point is earned if chooses component of domain of integrand containing 1 and finds all x such that 2x is in that component.

t 2 +t≥0;( t≥0 ) or ( t≤−1 ) Since 1≥0,want 2x≥0 Therefore x≥0

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned if indicates domain of integrand

1 point is earned if chooses component of domain of integrand containing 1 and finds all x such that 2x is in that component.

t  2  +t≥0; (  t≥0  ) or (  t≤−1  ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4ECB@

Since 1≥0,want 2x≥0 Therefore x≥0

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned if indicates domain of integrand

1 point is earned if chooses component of domain of integrand containing 1 and finds all x such that 2x is in that component.

t  2  +t≥0; (  t≥0  ) or (  t≤−1  ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4ECB@

Since 1≥0,want 2x≥0 Therefore x≥0
